markdown.markdown:
I'm a survey methodologist, R devotee and lifelong student.

I am associated with the [Centre for Sociological Research, University of Leuven](https://soc.kuleuven.be/ceso) and am currently pursuing the [MIT Master’s in Data, Economics, and Development Policy (DEDP)](https://economics.mit.edu/academic-programs/masters-programs/masters-data-economics-and-development-policy-dedp) (Class of 2023).

{{< fa solid download >}} Download my [resumé](_assets/202301 Celine Wuyts resumé.pdf).
